slides.title: First look at data
slides.caption: <p>In this chart we see malnutrition data for our 34 target countries. It is a time series from 1991 (previous years have been ignored) until the latest data. You can see that not all countries have the same amount of data.</p> <p>We use the above malnutrition data as a surrogate variable for percentage of growth stunting. First we will cluster our countries based on this data, and then we will look at the other 516 variables in our dataset to see if we can find other predictors of the clusters.</p>
